p: Participants registered prior to the program via an online survey (REDCap secure web application) and provided demographic information (gender, age, race/ethnicity, location, and scope of practice). Attendance data were tracked using reports generated by the Zoom platform. Unique attendees were defined as people who attended at least once and for at least 10 min. Registration and attendance data were linked together using name and email. Geographic information was mapped using QGIS Version 3.18.3 and natural breaks, using the Jenks method, were used.
